robot

Class BottomMotor

  • java.lang.Object
    • robot.BottomMotor

  • public class BottomMotor
extends java.lang.Object
    This is the motor class for the bottom motor of the robot.
    Author:
    Team 12: Ville Kautonen, Jerry HÃ¤llfors, Marko Korhonen

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      private int curRotation
      The current rotation of the motor is always saved here
      private static int maxRotation
      The maximum rotation the motor can handle
      private RegulatedMotor motor
      The LeJOS motor used in this class
      (package private) TouchSensor tSensor
      The touch sensor is used to stop the motor before the bottom motor hits anything

      Rotates the motor for a specified amount.

    • Method Detail

      • rotate

        public void rotate(int angle)
        Rotates the motor for a specified amount. Positive angle is away from the default position, negative angle is towards the default position.
        Parameters:
        angle - the angle to be rotated

      • rotateToDefaultPos

        public void rotateToDefaultPos()
        Rotates the motor back to it's default position, regardless of current position.
